Literature.Title: Identification of a new antimicrobial lysine-rich cyclolipopeptide family from Xenorhabdus nematophila.
Literature.Author: Gualtieri M, Aumelas A, Thaler JO

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa CIP 76.110(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli CIP 76.24(MIC=50µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=100µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>100µg/ml),Morganella morganii(MIC=>100µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris CIP 58.60(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CIP 76.25(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis CIP 68.21(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=25µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae CIP 103.566(MIC=>100µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus CIP 53.45(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Candida albicans CIP 48.72(MIC=50µg/ml),Galleria mellonella(no activity data)
